string.value: You may be able to confirm whether #p1013000# is really an Onyx Dragon with just one scale. Ask #b#p1013000##k to give you one scale.

#p1013000# says that his defenses will weaken if a scale is removed. He says that he'll need calcium to compensate and asks that you feed him bones. He says that #b#t4000204#s#k should suffice...\r\n\r\n#i4000204# #t4000204# #b#c4000204# / 50#k
You fed the #t4000204#s to #p1013000# and took one of his scales.
Ma... Master, why are you looking at me like that?\r\n#L0##bYou heard, didn't you? I need one of your scales. Give me one.#l\n#k

You want one of my scales? How could you say something so cruel with a straight face, master? Do you know how painful that would be?\r\n#L0##bWell, not really, but there is no other way for us to identify which family of Dragons you belong to. Come on now, hurry.#l\n#k

No way! I can't do that! How could you try to take one of my pretty and perfect scales? Think about it, master. How pathetic would you feel if you had a bald spot?\r\n#L0##bA scale isn't like hair. I can take one from your body where it wouldn't be so noticeable. #l\n#k
Wahhh, don't say that with such a happy face! I'm scared! Can't I give you something else? \r\n#L0##bSomething else... Like your horn?#l\n#k
Yikes! My horn? Of course not! Fine, just take a scale! But I have to consume enough calcium for my DEF to compensate for the loss of my scale.

Oh, what about a bone? I am going to eat a bone! If you go near #bRemains <Tomb>#k, you will find #r#o4230125#s#k. Bring me #b50#k of their #bBones#k! Then I will give you one... I repeat, just ONE scale.
Absolutely not, then! I don't care if you're my master, I can't just give you a scale. No way!

Did you already find all the #t4000204#s I've asked you to bring? I've always been impressed with your strength and speed, but I'm not so happy this time. Hmph, fine. Give me a minute. Eeeeeeeeeeeeek!
*sniff* Here is my scale. My precious scale. Please be careful with that. Okay? I'm not giving you another one.
Did you find all the #b#t4000204#s#k? I won't give you my scale if you don't give me #r50#k of them!
